titles.title: HP389 From thee all skill and science flow

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
From thee all skill and science flow,
All pity, care and love,
All calm and courage, faith and hope;
O pour them from above!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
And part them, Lord, to each and all,
As each and all shall need,
To rise like incense, each to thee,
In noble thought and deed.

verse.name: v3
v4
verse.lines:
When ever blue the sky shall gleam,
And ever green the sod;
And man's rude work deface no more
The paradise of God.
